name: data-act-broker-web-app
description: The DATA Act broker website is the front-end to the DATA Act broker backend. To increase access to and use of federal financial data in order to strengthen government-wide decision-making and accountability through data transparency, the broker relies on hundreds of distinct data elements to tell the story of how federal dollars are spent.
